column1: ,Sons2010,2013-02-25T07:24Z,help this game crashes when i start the game
,RiceKun,2013-02-28T13:28Z,"Didn't work for me. I use windows 7 64 bit. Error message below.
Steps taken: Unpacked, mounted .cue, ran .exe, copied crack.
If the online privacy statement is not available, please read our privacy statement offline:
Anyone have any idea how to fix it? First torrent I can't get working."
You need Windows Media Player installed on your pc in order to run the game.
At least it worked for me, tell me if it works for you too :D "
,jossan113,2013-03-02T14:05Z,"Don't work... I have all the fan-thbr-001 002 etc. files, but I cant put them together in winrar to begin to mount.. what should I do? Rly want this game"
,angma,2013-03-03T17:41Z,"Try installing the MS XNA redistributable... that's what is being referred to in the error msg.
The XNA Framework Redistributable provides the necessary runtime components to execute a game on Windows that was developed using Microsoft XNA Game Studio 4.0."""
